entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

text:
Dr. Birx: The U.S. is getting close to testing two million people per week. We want a million of those to be nursing home residents.

Note: Harvard experts  have said the United States should do 900,000 COVID-19 tests per day to contain its outbreak. https://t.co/bDDK31Bjjg
